pages.text: The $(d)Block Teleporter$() allows you to $(3)teleport the block in front of itself to another Block Teleporter$() when powered by Redstone.$(br2)Use a $(l:items/location_filter)Location Filter$(/l) on a Block Teleporter to save its location, and then insert that Filter into a second Block Teleporter.
pages.title: Block Teleporter

pages.text: When that second Block Teleporter is powered, it will try to swap the block in front of the first Block Teleporter with the block in front of itself.$(br2)Whether or not the Block Teleporter works across dimensions can be configured, but it defaults to true.
